title: Patriot Games / The Hunt for Red October
description: Good: A copy that has been read, but remains in clean condition. All pages are intact, and the cover is intact (including dust cover, if applicable). The spine may show signs of wear. Please note the cover may sometimes be different to the one shown.
author: Tom Clancy
